text.section:
An inmate shall be allowed a deduction of 5 days from the inmate's term of confinement for each calendar month of presentence confinement during which the inmate:
does not violate the rules of discipline; and
labors with diligence and fidelity when the opportunity for labor is available.

The deductions described in this section shall:
begin on the day the inmate arrives at the local correctional facility;
be made on a prorated basis for any portion of a calendar month of presentence confinement during which the inmate is committed to the local correctional facility; and
cease on the day the inmate is:
sentenced to a local correctional facility;
committed to the custody of the Commissioner of Correction; or
released.
